Sebelum Titik Noktah membawakan genre thriller, misteri yang diselit dengan penampilan wajah - wajah pelakon iaitu Aiman Hakim Redza, Puteri Balqis, dan Noki K-Clique. Diselubungi dengan misteri sehingga menimbulkan huru hara di sekitar perkelilingan orang - orang yang disayangi Hariz.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah Ep 5 Ep5
programme.desc: Hariz terpaksa dibebaskan semula, dan saat inilah Hariz mahu larikan dirinya, dia kembali ke kabin yang mana dia lihat sudah berubah kedudukan, dia yakin pembunuh masih ada di situ. Banyak rahsia disimpan sang penulis novel ini kian dirungkai.

programme.title: Plan B Ep 5 Ep5
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khai kalah dalam perlumbaan kereta "drift". Dia tidak mampu membayar wang taruhan sebanyak RM50 ribu lalu mengadai kereta lumbanya. Di rumah Khai terperangkap ketika dia cuba membuka peti besi wang bapanya. Dia dihalau dari rumah. Kemudian Khai berjaya meminjam wang daripada rakannya, Mica dan menebus kembali keretanya yang tergadai itu. Khai tidak pulang ke rumah hanya tidur dalam kereta yang dipakirnya di tepi jalanraya.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 2
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Adnan, seorang penunggang motosikal jalanan yang yatim piatu dan dijaga oleh bibinya. Di pihak lain, Nadia dilahirkan dalam keluarga yang kaya dan kini memiliki pekerjaan yang stabil. Kedua-dua individu yang berlatarbelakangkan dunia yang berbeza ini akhirnya bertemu secara kebetulan dan terjalin hubungan antara mereka.

programme.title: Adnan Sempit 3
programme.desc: Menyaksikan Adnan berkahwin dengan cinta zaman kanak-kanaknya, Nadia, manakala Bobby pula berkahwin dengan Wawa. Adnan juga semakin mahir menguruskan perniagaannya sendiri. Walau bagaimanapun, kedua-dua pasangan ini segera menyedari bahawa perkahwinan bukan sekadar berkongsi rumah bersama seseorang, tetapi lebih daripada itu.

programme.title: Bini-bini Ku Gangster
programme.desc: Manja dan Herry adalah sepasang suami isteri yang sangat romantik dan saling sayang menyayangi. Tanpa disedari oleh Herry, Manja adalah ketua kumpulan kepada sebuah geng gengster di Kuala Lumpur. Di pejabat,Herry kerap dibuli Mat Saja termasuk menyuruh Herry menggantikan tempatnya semasa ulangtahun perkahwinan Manja dan Herry yang ke2. Manja bengang lalu menghantar orang-orangnya memukul Mat Saja.

programme.title: Belum Berakhir
programme.desc: Awini seorang penyanyi kelab malam yang pernah menjalin hubungan dengan Fikri kembali menghantui hidup Fikri setelah lelaki itu meninggalkannya setelah berumah tangga dengan Dona. Pelbagai helah dilakukan Awini untuk menjejaskan hubungan Fikri dengan Dona agar Fikri kembali kepadanya.

programme.title: Main Wayang Episod 15
programme.desc: Program temu bual santai bersama peminat dan penggiat filem tempatan yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi tetamu berkaitan filem universe Rock arahan Mamat Khalid

programme.title: Nada Siar Episod 15
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang menyajikan kepada anda klip-klip video soundtrack yang terkandung dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan.

programme.title: Ruang Temu Episod 15
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Sifu M.Nasir yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan filem-filem yang diterajuinya.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin
programme.desc: Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai satu fobia dimana dia takut untuk bersanding dia atas pelamin setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil. Dalam masa yang sama, Johari juga mempunyai masalah yang sama dengan Aliah. Mereka telah bertemu di dalam dunia cyber dan beramah mesra dengan perbualan masing-masing sehingga hari ini. Rupa-rupanya ada kenangan di antara mereka berdua. Namun mereka bakal berkahwin dengan pasangan yang berlainan dari mereka dan kedua-duanya perlu bersanding di atas pelamin ketika majlis perkahwinan.

programme.title: Anak Abah
programme.desc: Zarith yang masih menuntut di luar negara terpaksa pulang ke tanah air untuk menjadi pengerusi dan menguruskan resort peninggalan ayahnya yang meninggal secara tiba-tiba akibat serangan jantung.Farhan yang merupakan salah seorang eksekutif resort tersebut tidak bersetuju di atas perlantikan tersebut kerana usia Zarith yang masih terlalu muda dan kurang pengalaman.Mujur ada Pak Din,pembantu peribadi arwah ayahnya dan Nina, setiausaha ayahnya yang selalu mendorong dan menyokong Zarith.

programme.title: Main Wayang Episod 15
programme.desc: Program temu bual santai bersama peminat dan penggiat filem tempatan yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi tetamu berkaitan filem universe Rock arahan Mamat Khalid

programme.title: Nada Siar Episod 15
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang menyajikan kepada anda klip-klip video soundtrack yang terkandung dalam filem-filem klasik tempatan.

programme.title: Ruang Temu Episod 15
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Sifu M.Nasir yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan filem-filem yang diterajuinya.

programme.title: Kembar Siam
programme.desc: Berwajah serupa namun merupakan dua orang yang berbeza. Dua jejaka dengan kehidupan yang berlainan - seorang ingin menjadi pelakon filem terkenal namun gagal manakala seorang lagi merupakan pelakon filem terkenal namun mengimpikan kebebasan. Mereka bertemu dan merancang sesuatu yang malangnya hanya telah menimbulkan kekacauan dan kekeliruan orang sekeliling.

programme.title: Bumbung Kiah Lantai Tipah
programme.desc: Nor merupakan seorang pemandu teksi yang sudah berkahwin dua . Rumah isteri pertama dan keduanya hanya dipisahkan oleh satu tingkat namun isteri pertamanya Tipah, tidak tahu bahawa Kiah yang tinggal di atas rumahnya adalah madunya begitu juga Kiah. Mereka yang dahulunya sahabat mula bertengkar setelah mengetahui akan hal tersebut.

programme.title: Alahai Manisnya Madu
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zul yang berkahwin dua dan cuba untuk menyembunyikan perihal tersebut dari pengetahun Zian, isteri pertamanya dan Nani, isteri keduanya. Zul berkahwin dengan kedua-dua wanita tersebut hanya selang seminggu sahaja kerana terpikat dengan kedua dua wanita tersebut dalam masa yang sama.

programme.title: Gemerlapan
programme.desc: Mimi mengejutkan ramai pelajar di sebuah kolej berprestij kerana menjadi seorang penggemar muzik dangdut yang tegar. Nel, salah seorang pelajar di situ menganggap muzik dangdut kekampungan dan mereka berdua sering bertengkar kerana hal tersebut. Tetapi tanpa disedari, Nel adalah Mr X yang selama ini merupakan peminat rahsia Mimi dalam diam.

programme.title: Belum Berakhir
programme.desc: Awini seorang penyanyi kelab malam yang pernah menjalin hubungan dengan Fikri kembali menghantui hidup Fikri setelah lelaki itu meninggalkannya setelah berumah tangga dengan Dona. Pelbagai helah dilakukan Awini untuk menjejaskan hubungan Fikri dengan Dona agar Fikri kembali kepadanya.

programme.title: Tuah
programme.desc: Datuk Shaari dan Shahira diselamatkan oleh seorang lelaki yang mendakwa bahawa dirinya Hang Tuah, seorang pahlawan Melayu di abad ke-15. Meragui kisahnya, mereka membawanya melakukan pemeriksaan fizikal dan mental di hospital, lama-kelamaan Shahira mula mempercayainya. Tuah secara ajaibnya telah dibawa ke zaman moden dan mula mempelajari apa yang terjadi pada masa lalu. Akhirnya, Tuah pulang semula ke tempat asalnya dan mula membetulkan keadaan.

programme.title: Anak Abah
programme.desc: Zarith yang masih menuntut di luar negara terpaksa pulang ke tanah air untuk menjadi pengerusi dan menguruskan resort peninggalan ayahnya yang meninggal secara tiba-tiba akibat serangan jantung.Farhan yang merupakan salah seorang eksekutif resort tersebut tidak bersetuju di atas perlantikan tersebut kerana usia Zarith yang masih terlalu muda dan kurang pengalaman.Mujur ada Pak Din,pembantu peribadi arwah ayahnya dan Nina, setiausaha ayahnya yang selalu mendorong dan menyokong Zarith.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin
programme.desc: Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai satu fobia dimana dia takut untuk bersanding dia atas pelamin setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil. Dalam masa yang sama, Johari juga mempunyai masalah yang sama dengan Aliah. Mereka telah bertemu di dalam dunia cyber dan beramah mesra dengan perbualan masing-masing sehingga hari ini. Rupa-rupanya ada kenangan di antara mereka berdua. Namun mereka bakal berkahwin dengan pasangan yang berlainan dari mereka dan kedua-duanya perlu bersanding di atas pelamin ketika majlis perkahwinan.

programme.title: Kasih Suami Isteri
programme.desc: Azman dan Akil merupakan rakan sekerja dan juga rakan serumah. Setelah Azman berkahwin dengan Syanie, Akil menjadi segan untuk tinggal serumah kerana tidak mahu menganggu mereka namun Syanie menjodohkan Akil dengan sahabtnya Sally lalu mereka tinggal serumah bersama-sama. Pelbagai kisah menarik dalam kedua-dua pasangan ini dalam melayari bahtera perkahwinan.

programme.title: Kembar Siam
programme.desc: Berwajah serupa namun merupakan dua orang yang berbeza. Dua jejaka dengan kehidupan yang berlainan - seorang ingin menjadi pelakon filem terkenal namun gagal manakala seorang lagi merupakan pelakon filem terkenal namun mengimpikan kebebasan. Mereka bertemu dan merancang sesuatu yang malangnya hanya telah menimbulkan kekacauan dan kekeliruan orang sekeliling.

programme.title: Bumbung Kiah Lantai Tipah
programme.desc: Nor merupakan seorang pemandu teksi yang sudah berkahwin dua . Rumah isteri pertama dan keduanya hanya dipisahkan oleh satu tingkat namun isteri pertamanya Tipah, tidak tahu bahawa Kiah yang tinggal di atas rumahnya adalah madunya begitu juga Kiah. Mereka yang dahulunya sahabat mula bertengkar setelah mengetahui akan hal tersebut.

programme.title: Tak Ori Tapi Ok
programme.desc: Keinginan seorang pengarah filem yang ingin menghasilkan naskhah baru. Yassin mahu melakukan kemunculan semula setelah sekian lama menemui jalan buntu dalam kerjayanya. Menemui seseorang yang mahu membiayai projek terbarunya, dia pun mula mencari pelakon-pelakon untuk membintanginya. Pelbagai rintangan dihadapinya dalam mencari pelakon yang boleh meniru gaya seperti P.Ramlee.

programme.title: Alahai Manisnya Madu
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zul yang berkahwin dua dan cuba untuk menyembunyikan perihal tersebut dari pengetahun Zian, isteri pertamanya dan Nani, isteri keduanya. Zul berkahwin dengan kedua-dua wanita tersebut hanya selang seminggu sahaja kerana terpikat dengan kedua dua wanita tersebut dalam masa yang sama.

Nel, salah seorang pelajar di situ menganggap muzik dangdut kekampungan dan mereka berdua sering bertengkar kerana hal tersebut. Tetapi tanpa disedari, Nel adalah Mr X yang selama ini merupakan peminat rahsia Mimi dalam diam.

programme.title: Anak Abah

programme.desc: Siapa sangka seorang suami yang diharapkan dapat menjadi imam keluarga justeru bertindak sesuka hati, mendera isterinya.

programme.title: Love Affair
programme.desc: Tee sering bertengkar dengan isterinya Thom, yang baru sahaja dikahwininya. Dia memutuskan untuk terbang ke London. programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Tara dan Niko merupakan pasangan muda yang berjaya. Namun setelah menikah tiga tahun, mereka belum juga dikaruniai anak.

programme.title: Tourguide Setengah Cinta
programme.desc: Tertekan dengan kerja di Jakarta, Monic (Masayu Clara) memilih untuk berehat dengan bercuti ke kampung. Tetapi ternyata Andra (Qausar Harta Yudana) adalah pemandu pelancong. Mengapa pemandu pelancong ini sangat kucar-kacir?

programme.title: Nang-Eye
programme.desc: Ini adalah kisah seorang gadis muda yang pergi ke sekolah biara di luar negara. Dia sangatgembira, suka bermain dan kadang-kadang agak berani.

programme.title: Seblak Empire Hentikan Ledakan Cinta
programme.desc: Secantik, Airin tetapi dia tidak malu untuk menjual seblak. Pada awalnya Rendra agak kesal kerana Airin menjual seblak, tetapi semakin lama Rendra telah jatuh cinta kepada Airin.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S13 Ep8
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep2

programme.title: Sesalan Terakhir
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Natasha merupakan anak tidak sah taraf. Hidupnya tidak seperti orang lain. Dia dipinggirkan orang kampung kerana sikap ibunya, Auni, yang sering menjalinkan hubungan dengan lelaki kaya kerana ingin memiliki kekayaan. Puas Natasha menasihati ibunya supaya kembali ke jalan yang benar.

programme.title: The Dream Boyz
programme.desc: Lapan rakan dari sebuah kelab drama cuba menyelamatkan masyarakat mereka dan merealisasikan impian mereka untuk mengeluarkan filem mereka pada masa yang sama.

programme.title: Love Affair

programme.title: Balasan Untuk Ayah Dzalim
programme.desc: (Toni) Ayah kepada Rahma, menganggap bahawa Rahma sebagai anak pembawa malang. Ini kerana isterinya meninggal dunia saat melahirkan Rahma. Walaupun begitu, Rahma tetap hormat kepada ayahnnya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep11
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Crime Kings
programme.desc: Seorang budak kaya-pergi-penyangak bertindak sebagai Robin Hood dalam kehidupan sebenar. Melindungi orang kaya, melindungi orang miskin, bermain permainan kucing-dan-tikus dengan polis tempatan, dalam karya zaman penuh aksi ini yang diilhamkan oleh kisah benar dari Thailand 1940-an.

programme.title: Rama-Rama
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Sahira, yang hidupnya terkongkong dalam mengejar ilmu keduniaan. Sahira tidak berpeluang untuk hidup bersosial dengan rakan sebaya. Adakah Sahira akan terus dikongkong?

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep14
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep60

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep12
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Di Antara Dua Cinta Ep10
programme.desc: Pada hari ulang tahun perkahwinan Shafira dan Rafael yang ke-2, Shafira dikejutkan dengan berita bahawa Rafael telah terlibat dalam satu kemalangan, dan jasadnya tidak ditemui. Beberapa tahun berlalu, Rafael akhirnya disahkan meninggal dunia. Shafira kemudian membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin semula dengan Julian. Namun, di puncak kebahagiaan perkahwinan mereka, Rafael tiba-tiba muncul kembali.

programme.title: Makan Terooos Ep1
programme.desc: Jelajahi kekayaan masakan yang menampilkan rasa autentik. Sertai kami dalam pengembaraan rasa di seluruh Indonesia, hanya di Makan Terooos, di mana setiap hidangan memiliki kisahnya sendiri.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep104
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Aaa Kasian Aaa Kesengsem Sama Idolaaa
programme.desc: Tanpa sengaja, Vivian bertembung dengan Mike. Ternyata, Mike adalah seorang idola yang digemari ramai wanita dan dikejar-kejar oleh para peminatnya kerana ketampanannya.

programme.title: Mega Series Suara Hati Istri: Anjani Ep12
programme.desc: Anjani berkahwin dengan Ammar melalui perkahwinan yang diatur, namun malangnya Ammar tidak mencintai Anjani, terutamanya selepas mengetahui bahawa Anjani sukar untuk hamil. Akhirnya, Anjani mengambil anak angkat yang ternyata mempunyai rahsia masa lalu dalam kehidupan suaminya.

programme.title: Mereka Yang Pergi Ep6
programme.desc: Mengungkap kisah-kisah menyentuh hati di sekeliling kita, tentang mereka yang kehilangan insan tersayang. Mampukah mereka kembali dalam kehangatan keluarga?

programme.title: Makan Terooos Ep1
programme.desc: Jelajahi kekayaan masakan yang menampilkan rasa autentik. Sertai kami dalam pengembaraan rasa di seluruh Indonesia, hanya di Makan Terooos, di mana setiap hidangan memiliki kisahnya sendiri.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 33 Ep15
programme.desc: Setiap tahun, karnival SCTV mempunyai tema yang berbeza. Karnival ini menyajikan acara muzik yang paling menarik dan menampilkan ramai musikus serta selebriti terkemuka tanah air.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Ado Gawe Ep16
programme.desc: Program separa dokumentari yang menjemput anda untuk meneroka destinasi unik, menikmati pelbagai masakan dan mengalami budaya yang menarik. Temui tarikan menawan di Palembang, yang dikenali sebagai Venice dari Timur.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep105
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Mendadak Tenar Sungguh di Luar Nalar
programme.desc: Berawal dengan Nina, penjual seblak. Wajah pemilik kedai seblak ini sangat mirip bahkan seakan-akan kembar dengan Tasya, seorang artis terkenal. Hingga akhirnya, Bryan, yang merupakan pengurus Tasya, bertemu secara tidak sengaja dengan Tasya.

programme.title: D'Koplo Ep12
programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Mak Comblang Cantiknya Terlalu ke Selatan
programme.desc: Rere dan Farhan adalah agen biro jodoh yang bertugas mencari jodoh untuk ramai orang. Farhan sudah sering berjaya dalam tugasnya, manakala Rere belum pernah berjaya sama sekali. Persaingan antara mereka sangat sengit. Hingga suatu malam, Rere bertekad untuk mencuri buku yang dimiliki Farhan. Dia berjaya mencuri buku tersebut dan menukarnya dengan buku lain.

programme.desc: D'Koplo (Musim 1) merupakan persembahan bakat nyanyian koplo dangdut pertama dari D'Koplo 2023. Juri utama musim ini terdiri daripada Soimah, Nassar, Dewi Perssik, dan Nita Thalia. Ada juga beberapa juri jempotan yang akan hadir.

programme.title: Steel Rain: Summit
programme.desc: A peace summit for Korea is derailed when the leaders of South Korea, North Korea and the U.S. are abducted by North Korean hardliners and held hostage in a submarine.

programme.title: A Werewolf Boy
programme.desc: A girl is sent to a country house for her health, where she befriends and attempts to civilize a feral boy she discovers on the grounds - but the beast inside him is constantly waiting to burst out.

programme.title: Sori: Voice From The Heart
programme.desc: A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: A retired contract killer investigates a kidnapping case which may involve his next of kin, all the while relentlessly chased by his last targets blood brother.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: The Point Men
programme.desc: A diplomat and an National Intelligence Service agent headed to Afghanistan to save South Korean missionaries captured by Taliban. They only have 24 hours...

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: A rock climber tries to save the day after a mad scientist releases a toxic gas that leaves thousands stranded in skyscrapers in Seoul district.

programme.title: The Moon
programme.desc: An astronaut is left stranded in space because of an accident during a spaceflight. The former director of the space centre strives to bring him home safely...

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: My Perfect Roommate
programme.desc: Living with strangers becomes even more challenging when it comes to 70-year-old lady and young college boy.

programme.title: Kingmaker
programme.desc: A politician met a talented campaign strategist who helped him in becoming the strongest presidential election candidate. Yet conflicts deepen as the he disagrees with the latter on his ideologies.

programme.title: Tunnel
programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: Fantastic Journey Season 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Meng Fei and Liu Zhenyun aunched"Fei Zhen Style Travel Agency," inviting their friends Li Yajuan (Saeki) and He Guangzhi to join. The organization travels from Xinjiang to Central Asia on "The Journey to the West" route. They travel to Kashgar, Turuban, and the Dukou Highway in "order-taking" mode before moving on to Uzbekistan, where they create a "private customized" experience for their consumers.

programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 6 (Repackaged) Ep9
programme.desc: The program has been refreshed and upgraded, departing from its initial structure. The topic of the show is "Listening to the Voice of the World, Singing With Legends." The musical extravaganza that will be created is full of infinite vitality and features over 30 singers, including Liu Yuning, Mao Buyi, Ma Jiaqi, Leo Ku, Hacken Lee, Tengger, and Gong Linna. The goal is to get back to the core of music and work together to produce fusion hits that will increase opportunities for collaboration and communication amongst the artists.

The goal is to get back to the core of music and work together to produce fusion hits that will increase opportunities for collaboration and communication amongst the artists.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep29
programme.desc: Chinese food culture is vast and profound, with each region having its own signature dishes. Everyone has different memories associated with food. This program explores the stories behind delicious food and preserves Chinese culinary culture.

programme.title: Talk With Famous Doctors Ep25
programme.desc: The program focuses new research and development of interactive health science popularization plan; from "treatment" to "prevention", increase the in-depth popularization of medical and health knowledge.

programme.title: Melody Journey (Repackaged) Ep7
programme.desc: This is the first original music performance program, which has invited singers such as Joker Xue, Jane Zhang, Zhou Shen, Shan Yichun, and Lars Huang. In addition to numerous emerging original music artists, it has also attracted veteran musicians such as Xiao Ke, Vincent Fang, and Huang Kuo-lun. The program consists of two core segments: a debut stage and a competition for an original song. This singer-songwriter interaction provides them a cooperative platform to produce a brand-new highlight for the Mandarin music scene.

programme.title: Dear Mom (M) Ep2425
programme.desc: Feng-Yi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, Shu-An, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. Yi-Wan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. Qing-Qing may be having an affair with a married man. Xiao-Xi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of "the others." An-Qing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When Feng-Yi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize they've neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep188
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5011
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1970
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3927
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Just Eat (M) Ep9
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2276
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep189
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5012
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about the abuse of residents in an Elderly and Disabled Care Home. To expose the homes wrongdoings, reporter Kay goes undercover to expose the inhumanity and unveil the cruel truth under broad daylight.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about the abuse of residents in an Elderly and Disabled Care Home. To expose the homes wrongdoings, reporter Kay goes undercover to expose the inhumanity and unveil the cruel truth under broad daylight.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC Chief Officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Ah Ma visits Phua Chu Kang, who is now based in Malaysia, but soon goes missing. Phua desperately searches for Ah Ma and finds her in a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, who unexpectedly offers Phua a renovation job. When suspicious deaths start occurring in the nursing home, Lim becomes the prime suspect. How will Phua resolve this?

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: L Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk and Chief Inspector Lau both hit a dead end when investigating their respective bribery and money laundering cases. When Luk is accused of bribery after being framed by the money launderers, he risks everything he has to find crucial evidence against them to clear his name.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Longs daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lungs house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lungs mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the walls?

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Martial Arts of Shaolin
programme.desc: Zhi Ming, who trains at the Northern Shaolin Temple, teams up with Si Ma Yan, who trains at the Southern Shaolin Temple, to avenge both their fathers death by assassinating a corrupt magistrate, leading to a series of fierce battles!

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Shaolin Intruders
programme.desc: On a routine courier mission, the prestigious Chief was murdered by four mysterious monks. When all evidence pointed to Ching Hua, his friend Lei decides to clear his name by barging in the Shaolin Temple thrice. When Lei thought justice was served for the culprits, he soon realizes the table had turned and the monks stroke again. What follows is a series of intense pursuit for the ultimate villain!

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiance Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the speed gang, led by Johnny, and Kuos sister Carrie is molested by Johnnys brother Michael. Kuos family continues to be harassed by the speed gang while on the island can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: The Devil's Mirror
programme.desc: A power-hungry Witch who leads the Bloody Ghouls Clan, seeks two magical mirrors, Wind Mirror and Thunder Mirror, which are owned by Bai and the Wen Clan respectively. She needs both mirrors to find the location of a powerful weapon that will make her invincible and will stop at nothing to get her hands on them.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: The Fantastic Magic Baby
programme.desc: The story is about the legendary Monkey King (Liu Chung-chun) teams up with Goddess of Mercy (Chao Li-chuan) and the Dragon Girl (Lung Nu) to battle the child god Hung Hai-erh (Ting Hua-chung),son of the Ox Demon (Hung Hai-erh) to rescue Tang Tseng, the Holy Pilgrim (Teng Chio-jen).

programme.title: Honey Bunny In Ghost Palace Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.title: Hagola Ep37
programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep98
programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep99
programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.title: Guru Aur Bhole Ep100
programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep43
programme.desc: A superhero child and his special car, Super Speedo, go on adventiures to save the world from villains.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep14
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep15
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru Ep43

programme.desc: A woman decides to fight against her powerful oppressor. When the guard of a chilli factory helps her, the women and the teacher of the village join them to openly defy the prevailing repression.

programme.title: I Am 24

programme.title: Captain

programme.title: Chhota Bheem And The Curse Of Damy

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan

programme.title: Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: After five criminals are released from a random police lineup, they plan a major heist that goes horribly awry. The police search for a mysterious crime lord, "Keyser Soze," who seems to be tied to the heist.

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champ's early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: After five criminals are released from a random police lineup, they plan a major heist that goes horribly awry. The police search for a mysterious crime lord, "Keyser Soze," who seems to be tied to the heist.

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s

programme.title: Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: A former marine and his cash-strapped brother prepare to go head to head in a mixed martial arts battle in order to win the biggest prize ever handed out in the sport. Will the fight force them to finally confront their past, or push them further apart?

programme.title: Shanghai
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as an American intelligence official who returns to Shanghai in late 1941 to investigate the death of a friend, which leads him to both love and a much larger conspiracy.

programme.title: Accused S2 Ep5

programme.title: Accused S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Val's Story - Based on the BBC's BAFTA-winning crime anthology, Accused opens in a courtroom on the accused, with viewers knowing nothing about their crime or how they ended up on trial. Told from the defendant's point of view through flashbacks, this series holds a mirror up to the current times with evocative and emotional stories. In Accused, viewers discover how an ordinary person gets caught up in an extraordinary situation, ultimately revealing how one wrong turn leads to another, until it's too late to turn back.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Oscar winner Peter Jackson directs Naomi Watts, Jack Black and Adrien Brody in this cinematic vision filled with non-stop action, terrifying creatures and groundbreaking special effects.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Tom Hanks reprises his role as Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon, who once again finds that forces with ancient roots are willing to stop at nothing, even murder, to advance their goals.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Enter a universe where more than one wears the mask.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

programme.title: Doom: Annihilation
programme.desc: Based on the popular original video game, Doom: Annihilation is an explosive, terrifying thrill ride.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Scream 4
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox, and David Arquette resurrect their famous roles in this spine-chilling sequel. Ghostface returns to Woodsboro but its a new decade, with new rules.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Tom Hanks reprises his role as Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon, who once again finds that forces with ancient roots are willing to stop at nothing, even murder, to advance their goals.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Oscar winner Peter Jackson directs Naomi Watts, Jack Black and Adrien Brody in this cinematic vision filled with non-stop action, terrifying creatures and groundbreaking special effects.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: Iron Man: Rise Of Technovore
programme.desc: When a young terrorist named Ezekiel Stane attacks Starks Industries with a lethal biotechnology that threatens to destroy the world, it is up to IRON MAN to hunt down Stane and his bio-enhanced monsters known as Technovores.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: A commando colonel leads a covert mission to rescue kidnapped relief workers from a psychotic warlord.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) is a career assassin who is in Bangkok to handle a contract, when he finds himself unexpectedly training a young protg and falling for a woman who has no knowledge of his true vocation.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Joseph Smith comes home from war but has been left disturbed by his experiences. Despite his intentions to start a new life, he becomes caught up in the criminal underworld, where he plots revenge on his friend's killer.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) is a career assassin who is in Bangkok to handle a contract, when he finds himself unexpectedly training a young protg and falling for a woman who has no knowledge of his true vocation.

programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse

programme.title: DOA: Dead Or Alive

programme.title: The Green Hornet

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When retired CIA agent finds himself the target of a deadly assassin he reaches out to his old work friends in a bid to learn the truth while staying out of the mysterious enemy's clutches.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses and his team of hapless heroes return for another risky mission - this time tasked with finding a dangerous nuclear weapon. The team embark on a perilous journey to Europe pursued by deadly terrorists and government officials.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep4

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S5 Ep5
programme.desc: In the US a man and his dog take cover as a rare tornado outbreak rips through towns on the East coast. In Norway, a boxer has the fight of his life when a swim under the ice goes disastrously wrong and in Western Australia, a homeowner is in a faceoff with the flames.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep6
programme.desc: First constructed in the 1930s, the West Side Line - an elevated viaduct section of the New York Central Railroad - was abandoned in the 1980s. But since 2009 it's been totally revitalised.

programme.desc: Cuba - Alongside Cuban fishermen Robson searches for sardines, tarpons, bonefish, barracudas and grouper fish.

programme.title: Whale with Steve Backshall S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Steve Backshall explores the evolving understanding of whales, how much they have in common with humans, and how recent discoveries could help to better protect them from threats in an increasingly changing world.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S10 Ep4
programme.desc: Shadow Dwellers - With winter tightening its grip, Alaskans buckle down and ready themselves for the long months ahead.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Japan - Robson fishes for some of Japan's famous fish, including the famously poisonous Fugu and other exotic catches.

programme.title: Wild Scandinavia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Ice and Fire - Scandinavia's extremes have been shaped by ice and fire, but it's the sun that reigns here. Polar bears, musk oxen and arctic foxes must survive from the polar night to the midnight sun.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Jordan - The Wadi Rum Desert - With its mountains rising up out of the sand, any journey through the Wadi Rum will leave you feeling you've traveled to another world. Join Ryan as he explores Amman and makes the arduous trek through the unforgiving Wadi Rum Desert.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep6
programme.desc: Azores - On Flores in the Azores, Ben meets a family who live off-grid in a cottage on a steep mountain.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Japan - Robson fishes for some of Japan's famous fish, including the famously poisonous Fugu and other exotic catches.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Winter is Coming Ep1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where its warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Sammi, Rose, and Casey Ep1
programme.desc: Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Bandit, Max, and George Ep2
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore Tasmanian devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Boss Shark
programme.desc: Witness the ultimate battle for dominance as scientists try to pick out the alpha male in a pack of 100-plus great white sharks off the New Zealand coast. Marvel at the speed, hunting prowess, and fearlessness that determine the leader of the pack.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its preys heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the oceans vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - The Lower Zambezi Ep4
programme.desc: Food, water and shelter are essential to all life on earth from the smallest of beings to the largest, and along the banks of one of Africas greatest rivers, some animals struggle while others thrive. A rhythm drives all animals as they journey in search of what they need to survive, and each must decide where and when to move if theyre to succeed... These are the magical worlds of the Lower Zambezi.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Ep5
programme.desc: In the heart of Zululand, South Africa, lies the oldest game reserve on the African continent Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Here, Southern white rhinos have found protection from people in times of turmoil. Hunted almost to extinction at the end of the 19th century, the parks establishment gave rhinos a lifeline breeding them back from extinction.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Birds of Prey Ep2
programme.desc: Birds of prey are amazing hunters. Their adaptations allow them to catch a wide range of prey in a variety of environments. This is a look at some of the most fearsome North American birds of prey.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge 1 - So Long and Thanks for All the Fish Ep3
programme.desc: Bundle up as an icy October storm complicates the race to the finish line. See Big Boi bounce after a stumble before tragedy hits QuadMom, and cheer as fan fave BoldFace hits her stride despite her clingy kid, Raccoon. But who will wear the crown?

programme.title: Big Cats, Small World 1 - Summer Cubs Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome spring on the Gomoti River, where cheetah mum Phefo and lion mum Tshaba teach their cubs survival skills and keep them out of the jaws of the big male cats. See lion king Molelo go into battle while leopard Senatia tries to ensure his legacy.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals 1 - Collar Complications Ep3
programme.desc: Rejoin the team for some post-rainy-season drama as they search for Ferinha, Fera, and Badalo, whose tracking collars are missing. Meet a new biologist who helps Lizzie recollar the jaguars, adding a high-tech device that will record even more data.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3
programme.desc: See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day Ep4
programme.desc: Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Tropical Ep1
programme.desc: Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Jasper, Terry, and Gumbo Ep6
programme.desc: Embrace an invasive nutria whos become part of the family, paddle around with Gumbo the goose, and visit a blind hedgehog and his human chum. Explore a swimmers bond with wild gray seals and hang out with Cosima the monkey and Jasper the serval.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Insect Eaters Ep3
programme.desc: Every predator needs a speciality - and these tenacious insect-eaters have a great one. They evolved to hunt a virtually unlimited food source: bugs. With highly-developed hunting skills, they source, kill and consume with great success.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - A New Zealand Christmas Ep3

programme.title: Jaguar Journals 1 - The Queen is Back Ep4
programme.desc: Feel the heat as Lizzie and veterinarian Joares scramble to collar more jaguars amid storms, floods, and power outages. Try to pin down the elusive Badalo before his data-gathering tag drops off and meet a new female the team is eager to study.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Young Up-Start Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 - Seasonal Ep2
programme.desc: Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway 1 - Food, Glorious Food Ep1
programme.desc: Embark on a dangerous tagging mission in South Australia that will show what sharks eat and why they gather in feeding hot spots. Then head north as a team chases tiger, bull, and hammerhead sharks and outfits one with a 360-degree dorsal camera.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Waterhole Ep1
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badgers risky dance with a deadly snake.
